column4: Hello. Did anybody install Ubuntu recently? I'd like your ~/.bashrc -- Please.
The standard bashrc, if there even is one, likely resides in /etc/skel (if you deleted yours)
I see. I'm on Debian. I'd like to see Ubuntu's /etc/skel/.bashrc
Ah, ok, well, guess you'll have to wait for someone to post theirs. I don't run Ubuntu either.
